Yes I do remember this one... Actually for the group Barb did a
filmography and this was included... Check out other films at
www.shinsengumihq.com/film.htm and you can also check out
www.shinsengumidb.com and search for films. What else... Thanks for
the additional info, I'll update the movie in the db.

messages.subject: Re: Bakumatsu Jyunjyoden

messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "yutaru" <lil_azn_kuni@h...> wrote:
> Hay everyone! long time since ive posted (sorry i've been busy with
> alot of other stuff ^^;;) wellz i was searching around the
internet,
> im not sure if anyone posted on this yet (sorry if you have) but i
> found a movied called, "Bakumatsu Jyunjyoden". I don't know all the
> details, but here's a small summary i found on it
>
> With a famous samurai of Shinsengumi, Soji Okita as a woman,
Toshizo
> Hijikata and Ryoma Sakamoto rival for her affections.
> Director Mitsuyuki Yakushiji
> Cast Ken Watanabe / Riho Makise / Tetta Sugimoto
> Running time 105min
>
> Unfortunetly i haven't found any place where they're selling it.

Ohh i just found a better summary

In the last days of the Tokugawa shogunate, there was a cute warrior,
Souji Okita, who belonged to the armed police of the shogunate in
Kyoto. Very few knew that Souji was not a boy, but a woman. Souji
loved the vice-leader of the armed police, Toshizou Hijikata. Souji
suffered from pulmonary tuberculosis and coughed up blood during a
battle. Toshizou helped her but said that he did not care for the
girl with a smell of blood. Souji had a real talent for swordsmanship
and no one but Ryouma Sakamoto could compete with her. Ryouma was a
liberal intellectual and tried to carry out a revolution without
blood. However, the bloody Meiji Restoration broke out and Souji
killed Ryouma who lost his dream. Because a friendship had sprung up
between Toshizou and Ryouma, Toshizou got angry and slashed at Souji
with a sword. Unwillingly, she unsheathed her sword and thought that
she might get love if she was killed by the man she loved.

messages.subject: Bakumatsu Jyunjyoden
messages.msgSnippet: Hay everyone! long time since ive posted (sorry i ve been busy with alot of other stuff ^^;;) wellz i was searching around the internet, im not sure if anyone
messages.messageBody:
Hay everyone! long time since ive posted (sorry i've been busy with
alot of other stuff ^^;;) wellz i was searching around the internet,
im not sure if anyone posted on this yet (sorry if you have) but i
found a movied called, "Bakumatsu Jyunjyoden". I don't know all the
details, but here's a small summary i found on it

With a famous samurai of Shinsengumi, Soji Okita as a woman, Toshizo
Hijikata and Ryoma Sakamoto rival for her affections.
Director Mitsuyuki Yakushiji
Cast Ken Watanabe / Riho Makise / Tetta Sugimoto
Running time 105min

Unfortunetly i haven't found any place where they're selling it.
